text.Prompt:
The following is a product description written by our marketing expert using the following product specifications and product title.

Product title:
Garden Mount Weathervane, Model 9340 - Flag Design

Product specifications:
Made of 14 gauge Steel
Comes with 60 in. Mounting rod
Antique copper Finish
Sealed ball bearings in the wind-cup ensure easy and fluid movement
Garden Mount Only
text.Response A: Storm is one of the most iconic and powerful mutants in the X-Men universe.  This detailed sculpture captures her in her classic white costume.  The statue measures 12" Tall and is a Bowen Designs Sculpture, sculpted by Mark Newman, Gabe Perna, and Randy Bowen.  This would make a great addition to any X-Men collection!
text.Response B: The Garden Mount Weathervane, Model 9340 - Flag Design is made of durable 14 gauge steel with an antique copper finish and sealed ball bearings. This weathervane is designed for garden mounting and features a flag design.

meta.preamble_a: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.

680.displayed_text:
Prompt

The following is a product description written by our marketing expert using the following product specifications and product title.

Product title:
Garden Mount Weathervane, Model 9340 - Flag Design

Product specifications:
Made of 14 gauge Steel
Comes with 60 in. Mounting rod
Antique copper Finish
Sealed ball bearings in the wind-cup ensure easy and fluid movement
Garden Mount Only

Response A

Storm is one of the most iconic and powerful mutants in the X-Men universe. This detailed sculpture captures her in her classic white costume. The statue measures 12" Tall and is a Bowen Designs Sculpture, sculpted by Mark Newman, Gabe Perna, and Randy Bowen. This would make a great addition to any X-Men collection!

Response B

The Garden Mount Weathervane, Model 9340 - Flag Design is made of durable 14 gauge steel with an antique copper finish and sealed ball bearings. This weathervane is designed for garden mounting and features a flag design.
